backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, fields, and tasks with authorization checks and CRUD APIs for profiles and fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend update that improves error handling for field creation when the user is not registered.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for all major frontend files, describing their roles and recent enhancements.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide detailing reproducible steps for testing field creation failures and expected behaviors.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Documentation explaining causes of profile save failures, implemented fixes, and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads pre-react globals and the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling boot flow, actor/profile loading, error recovery, authentication state, and profile setup modal display.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Registers global boot‑time error handlers and shows a styled fallback error UI if the app fails before React mounts.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Initializes browser-safe global shims (process, env, global) and imports boot fallback handlers before other modules load.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Displays all tasks with searching, sorting, and field lookup, rendering task cards or skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with authentication checks and backend submission handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a task with scale inputs, duration settings, and dependency selection, submitting to backend on save.
Dialog for renaming an existing field and saving updates via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing a task’s attributes, duration, dependencies, and field, supporting updates and field moves.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Displays a clickable field card showing field name, active task count, and computed attribute badges.
Shows a detailed field view with task list filtering, sorting, dialogs for creating/editing tasks, and field deletion.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with theme toggle, user avatar menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Shows a login screen listing app features and a button to authenticate via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile, handling auth and loading states.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: Displays a recoverable error message with retry button and optional loading state.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button with tooltip to toggle ascending/descending sort direction.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Displays a task with attributes, completion/undo actions, dependency display, and edit/delete dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout logic, and initializes AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend queries and mutations for profiles and tasks with error handling and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds a resilient actor instance with retry logic and invalidates queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the dashboard with field/task views, sorting, filtering, and authentication-aware actions.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Utility functions for detecting unregistered users and normalizing boot-time errors into readable messages.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Provides utilities to convert durations between units and format minutes into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field-creation errors into categorized, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Maps profile-save errors to normalized categories with clear messages covering auth, actor state, and unknown issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current feature set and metadata for a task and field management system.
